column4: I am not able to use flashdrive on my pc...I use Hardy plz help!
I am not able to use flashdrive on my pc...I use Hardy plz help!
type "mount" in the terminal and paste the output to a pastebin
this is what i got http://paste.ubuntu.com/99695/
looks like it's not mounting... is the light on the drive coming on?
Go to the terminal, and type "cd /media", then type "ls", and see if there is a usb entry
no there is no usb entry
then I can't help you... I don't know why your USB drive isn't being recognised. Someone else may be able to help. Sorry!
when I use lsusb then I get a response
I'm sorry.... I'm not intelligent enough to know how to troubleshoot beyond this point.
this is what I get when I use lsusb http://paste.ubuntu.com/99702/
just hav a look at it
so... it sees it.... but it's not automounting...
sure. Lemme grab a USB stick to try it myself.
try running this in the terminal: "sudo mount /dev/sdb1 /mnt"
